metadata.dc:author: Moles, J R
Del Val, A
Morillas, J
Garrigues, V
Gaspar, E
Berenguer, J
metadata.dc:description: A patient with Schönlein-Henoch purpura presented with gastrointestinal complaints as the first manifestation of the syndrome. The nature of the disease could be diagnosed after the late appearance of haematuria and purpura.
metadata.dc:title: Afectación gastrointestinal como primera manifestación de una púrpura de Schönlein-Henoch.
[Gastrointestinal involvement as the first manifestation of Schoenlein-Henoch purpura].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
